name: Legless Knight
description:
Shoot 'em up without moving.

You are a legless knight with a magic trusty arrow that allows you to teleport at will and a thousand more to defeat the enemies in the dungeon.

CONTROLS: Left click to shoot, Right click to shoot/teleport magic arrow

NOTE: We are aware of a tiny rare bug in which dungeons do not spawn a key or a boss, if it happens we are very sorry, ESCAPE returns you to the menu. We are working on fixing it.
